price: Kandi (twarabavumye) kubera ubuhakanyi bwabo n’imvugo yabo yuje ikinyoma gihambaye bagiriye Mariyamu (bamushinja ubusambanyi).
arabic: وَبِكُفۡرِهِمۡ وَقَوۡلِهِمۡ عَلَىٰ مَرۡيَمَ بُهۡتَٰنًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wabikuf'rihim waqawlihim ʿalā maryama buh'tānan ʿaẓīman
